content: **adina lace bolero** ======================================= fabulously feminine and delicate this lace bolero crochet pattern is perfect for a special occasion the stunning lace pattern is deceptively simple and even meditative once you have worked a few repeats the construction is uncomplicated too with minimal seaming this pattern is sure to become a firm favourite in your summer crochet collection the pattern includes a detailed stitch chart for the lace pattern to fit bust circumference sizes based on craft yarn council standards xs/s 28 - 34 / 81 - 86cm m/l 36 - 42 / 101 5 - 106 5cm xl/2x 44 - 50 / 122 - 127cm 3x/4x/5x 52 - 58 / 142 - 147cm **yarn requirements** you can use any #2/fine/sport weight yarn for this garment the amounts given here are for hobbii metallico fine 289yds/265m per 50g skein weight #2/fine 70% polyamide 20% acrylic 10% merino wool xs/s 700 yds / 640m m/l 1000 yds / 914m xl/2x 1150 yds / 1052m 3x/4x/5x 1350 yds / 1234m --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more ---- © ned & mimi 2020 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
